title: Before and after you leave Australia
summary: The page provides guidance for people leaving Australia, including tax implications when selling property, steps to follow before departure, and how to access superannuation after leaving. It outlines eligibility requirements for the Departing Australia Superannuation Payment (DASP) and details the process for claiming it. It also highlights assistance programs and warnings about travelling to conflict zones.

selling_property_tax_rules.foreign_residents_cgt_main_residence_exe: Foreign residents cannot claim the CGT main residence exemption when selling Australian residential property except in limited circumstances.
selling_property_tax_rules.historical_rule_change_date: Before 9 May 2017, former Australian residents could still claim the exemption.
